Summary I thrive on applying my computer engineering know-how to facilitate and foster scientific research. In particular, I enjoy using my skills in Python programming, web technologies, systems administration, and enterprise-class data storage to enable scientific data management and high performance computing.

• Software Engineering 
• Enterprise-class data storage
